data.title: downtown cinema 8
data.text:
August 15 - 21 Schedule

EARLY SUMMERTIME BARGAIN MATINEES ARE RUNNING THROUGH SUNDAY !!!

Click on a MOVIE TITLEto take you to the movies homepage !!!

Click on Movie trailer to watch the preview !!!

ALIEN : ROMULUS - Sci-Fi Horror -

Movie trailer

PLOT: While scavenging the deep ends of a derelict space station, a group of young space colonizers come face to face with the most terrifying life form in the universe.

CONTENT: 17 and older, with ID - Bloody violent content and language.

LENGTH, including previews: 2:15.

STARRING: Isabela Merced, Cailee Spaeny, Archie Renaux, David Jonsson.

August 15 - 21 schedule

Early summertime bargain matinees Friday - Sunday !!!

Thursday at 4:10, 7:00,

Friday - Sunday at 1:20, 4:10, 7:00,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:40,

Monday - Wednesday at 4:10, 7:00

IT ENDS WITH US - PG-13 - Romantic Drama -

Movie Trailer

PLOT: Lily believes she's found true love with Ryle, but when a painful incident triggers past trauma, she must decide if love alone can carry her marriage through. However, things are complicated when her first love returns to her life.

CONTENT: Rated PG-13 for domestic violence, sexual content, and some strong language.

LENGTH, including previews: 2:20.

STARRING: Blake Lively, Brandon Sklenar, Jenny Slate, Alex Neustaedter.

August 15 - 21 schedule

Early summertime bargain matinees Thursday - Sunday !!!

Thursday - Sunday at 1:20, 4:10, 7:20,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:40,

Monday - Wednesday at 4:10, 7:20

BORDERLANDS - PG-13 - Action Adventure Comedy -

Movie trailer

PLOT: After returning to her home planet Pandora, infamous outlaw Lilith is given a dangerous mission and forms an alliance (and potential friendship) with other criminals, including former mercenary Roland, demolitionist Tiny Tina and her protector Krieg, insane scientist Tannis, and the wisecracking robot Claptrap. The mission: find and protect the missing (and important) daughter of a powerful man named Atlas. But things may not be as they seem, as the girl holds the key to great power that can change the fate of the universe.

CONTENT: Rated PG-13 for intense sequences of violence and action, language and some suggestive material.

LENGTH, including previews: 1:55.

STARRING: Gina Gershon, Cate Blanchett, Haley Bennett, Kevin Hart.

August 15 - 21 schedule

Early summertime bargain matinees Thursday - Sunday !!!

Thursday - Sunday at 1:40, 4:30, 7:10,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:40,

Monday - Wednesday at 4:30, 7:10

TRAP - PG-13 - Crime Horror Mystery -

Movie trailer

PLOT: A father and his teen daughter attend a pop concert only to realize they've entered the center of a dark and sinister event.

CONTENT: Rated PG-13 for some violent content and brief strong language.

LENGTH, including previews: 2:00.

STARRING: Josh Hartnett, Hayley Mills, Alison Pill, Ariel Donoghue.

August 15 - 21 schedule

Early summertime bargain matinees Thursday - Sunday !!!

Thursday - Sunday at 1:30, 4:20, 7:10,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:40,

Monday - Wednesday at 4:20, 7:10

DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE -

Sci-Fi Action Comedy

Movie trailer

PLOT: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

CONTENT: 17 and older, with ID - Strong bloody violence and language throughout, gore and sexual references.

LENGTH, including previews: 2:20.

STARRING: Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Emma Corrin, Morena Baccarin.

August 15 - 21 schedule

Early summertime bargain matinees Thursday - Sunday !!!

Thursday - Sunday at 1:20, 4:10, 7:00,

Plus late shows Fri. and Sat. at 9:40,

Monday - Wednesday at 4:10, 7:00

FUTURE MOVIES

Click on a MOVIE TITLE to take you to the movies homepage !!!

Click on Movie trailer to watch the preview !!!

ADMISSION PRICES

Showtimes before 5 PM are matinee discount showtimes

All Seats ( 3 and older ) - $ 7.25, or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies!!!

Evening showtimes ( 5 PM and later )

Adult - $ 9.25 , or $11.75 for 3-D movies

Child ( 3 - 12 ) - $ 7.25 , or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies

Sr. Citizen ( 62 + over , or AARP ) - $ 7.25, or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies

College or Military with current college or military ID

Fri. - Sun. evenings - $ 8.25, or $ 10.75 for 3-D movies

College or Military with current college or military ID

Mon. - Thur. evenings - $ 7.25, or $ 9.75 for 3-D movies

Boxoffice opens about 20 minutes before the earliest showtime for that day !!!
